data.name: Legends Of Iona RPG (2007)
data.detailed_description:
Play as Zaak, a young man trapped in an ancient underground world. He must face many dangers in order to escape. However, during his adventures, Zaak will awaken a past long-lost forgotten…

BEFORE YOU BUY AND RATE THE GAME, PLEASE READ:
This is a late publishing of a 2006-2007 video game. But the owners made a promise to complete it and publish it one day. The game was built by fans of Phantasy Star(Sega). That is why the graphics look retro etc. A new, more modern version of Iona remake is under production (follow us on our Facebook page). I am sure you will see quite a difference. But this original version is still quite cute light fun, so enjoy! You must play until dungeon 3+ to unlock special attacks and understand the game ambiance and full potential. This game is aimed at quests, it is not a complicated battle system since the target audience is general. You can turn off the bonus trivia questions with the slider on the left side of the screen. Play Iona, the story gets better as you progress in this game (It has a slow build-up). Talk to the first guard to start your quests. There is a button on the lower right to check out the QUESTS so you know what to do in this Role Playing Game. If you like battles, you need more information and details, turn on the BATTLELOG. We care about the game and listen to the player's experience, that is why we made many upgrades and more to come. Ok? let's start gaming!

This fun dungeon crawler role-playing game is rated general aimed at family gaming or geeks. The gameplay is simple and in order to enjoy this game, you must follow the quests and dialogues with the characters in the game. Contrary to other RPG's this game does not have typical spells, but rather cool combinations of weapons with Ionix crystals since the main focus is... The Ionix crystals found on the world of Iona.

Features

  • 5 giant levels filled with dungeons, treasures, monsters and open spaces with a lot of important characters to meet and help through enjoyable quests.
  • Story-line, species, and characters are well-developed serves as foretold of the upcoming MMO World Of Iona.
  • The atmosphere of this game takes the best gameplay seen in RPG's from the '80s and '90s merged with modern gameplay and wide areas.
  • Different gameplay: traditional spells and skills gameplay is now combinations of Ionix crystals and special armor and weapons crafting.
  • Unlock 3 special attack combo moves.
  • Similar to old school RPG's, this game is an average 30+ hours of gameplay. There is no blood/gore in this game.
  • New concept: An integrated cultural E-learning battle system (c) (EBS) to improve player's general knowledge!
In order to feel the coolness of the game, you may need to play at least level 3/5. Level five showcase all features and special attack moves. *We challenge YOU to complete this game*. Remember you will understand the fun about the EBS questions only through playing it yourself. And at all times you can disable the questions or adjust the subjects you prefer. Click on Zaak's brain!

data.short_description: Zaak is trapped! Ps2 style cute retro five-level dungeon crawler hack and slash role-playing game. Unlock the power of the Ionix crystals and be a hero. The focus is quests-story. Bridging the best of the 90s to today's gameplay, we dare you to finish the game.
data.reviews:
“At last, a geek game I like! I am so happy to see this game out !”
4.5/5 – Luduc, Youtube Channel

“Here is the proof that Studio Desgraff stands out with this jewel!”
4.5/5 – Alain Rivard SeniorFX (StarTrek, BattleStar Gallactica)

“I am impressed by the graphics and the extent of the game. My family and I will enjoy!”
4.6/5 – Martin L. CEO, Rayon FX
